title: Fintokei Check website
description: Fintokei, based in the Czech Republic, was established in April 2023. The firm is a CFD provider offering 3 Steps, 2 Steps, and 1 Step programs. It supports MT5, cTrader, TradingView and MT4 platforms. Fintokei describes itself as an education and evaluation company for traders, providing a structured environment to improve trading skills. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: Over Leveraging: Random large trades without strategy.
Tick scalping: >10% of trades opened/closed within 10 seconds. Warning then termination.
One-sided betting: Big trades during high volatility/news hoping for spike.
All-in trading: Achieving Profit Target in one trade (or few similar).
Max risk: Max risk of open trades is 3% (based on SL or VaR).
Profit Target: Achieving target in one trade prohibited.

payout_policy.minimum_payout: ProTrader/StartTrader: 100 EUR/USD, 2000 CZK, 20000 JPY. SwiftTrader: 3% minimum profit.
payout_policy.details: Net positive payout policy applied if gambling detected. SwiftTrader payouts available every 14 days with 3% min profit.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Prohibited to pay for service on behalf of someone else (Third-party payment).
firm_rules.news_trading: Restricting trading during news if gambling detected.
forbidden_strategies: Over Leveraging: Random large trades without strategy.
Tick scalping: >10% of trades opened/closed within 10 seconds. Warning then termination.
One-sided betting: Big trades during high volatility/news hoping for spike.
All-in trading: Achieving Profit Target in one trade (or few similar).
Max risk: Max risk of open trades is 3% (based on SL or VaR).
Profit Target: Achieving target in one trade prohibited.

seo_content:
Fintokei Technical Infrastructure

Fintokei, based in the Czech Republic, was established in April 2023. The firm is a CFD provider offering 3 Steps, 2 Steps, and 1 Step programs. It supports MT5, cTrader, TradingView and MT4 platforms. Fintokei describes itself as an education and evaluation company for traders, providing a structured environment to improve trading skills. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: Fintokei Full Report: Leverage, Rules & Payouts
youtube_metadata.description: Complete technical breakdown of Fintokei. We analyze their forex environment and execution rules.
